Frequently Asked Questions

Direct Patient Consultation

We take insurance! We currently accept Medicare, Medicaid, Blue Cross Blue Shield, and United Health Care.

Absolutely. We understand your needs are ever-changing and while we want to meet your goals we understand alternatives exist. We only ask that scheduled appointments are cancelled within a 48 hour window for scheduling purposes.

Group Meeting

We have two options! We offer a fixed 10-session virtual dietary bootcamp with our partner practice, Northern Green Mountain Family Medicine (https://www.northernfamilymed.com/). This bootcamp will provide you with the necessary tools to better manage Diabetes and other arising comorbidities. The other alternative in our group sessions is our private 10-week program that is offered once every quarter. Please reach out to us for more information on this offering.

Newsletter Services

Relevant information delivered straight to your e-mail! The newsletter is FREE for all active patients and clients of Bettr Full. Non-clients can enroll in a monthly subscription. We deliver bi-weekly newsletters that synthesize the latest research in nutrition, health, and diabetes. Additionally, we e-deliver educational media cards for highly digestible education and continued reminders towards wellness decision-making. Additionally, our newsletters include special content such as "Nic's Pick," where we analyze current up-and-coming food and wellness brands based on client and provider requests. You'll also find week-to-week insights into our own dietitian's food journey, providing real educational examples.
